page.title: 14MY PARENTS WORK
page.content: I live in the Old School at Beetley. We came there because it was big to work in.My Mum and Dad make leather shoes. They have to stitch them and stick soles on. We get the leather from Start-rite in Norwich. We make sandals, shoes and boots in lots of colours. These are some of the colours we use, red, bright blue, pink, orange, dark green, white, brown, grey, black and turquoise. The boots are mostly one colour, they have little stripes where the laces are that goes to the top and then all around. My Mum usually takes the finished articles to market, but at the moment my Dad does because my Mum has a sore knee. The market is in London. It is called Covent Garden.
